All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AmbientLight
 
Camera
The Camera class represents a virtual camera in 3D space.
Camera.Builder
Builder class for constructing Camera instances with flexible configuration.
CameraIntersectionsIntegrationTests
Integration tests between Camera and Geometries (Sphere, Plane, Triangle)
Cloneable
Marker interface to indicate that a class supports cloning.
Color
Wrapper class for java.jwt.Color The constructors operate with any non-negative RGB values.
Cylinder
Represents a cylinder in 3D space, defined by a central axis and a height.
Double3
This class will serve all primitive classes based on three numbers
Geometries
Represents a collection of geometries that can be treated as a single entity.
Geometry
Represents a general geometric object in 3D space.
Intersectable
Interface representing an object that can be intersected by a ray.
Main
Test program for the 1st stage
Plane
Represents a plane in 3D space, defined by either three points or a point and a normal vector.
Point
Represents a point in 3D space.
Polygon
Polygon class represents a two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
RadialGeometry
Represents a geometric object with a radial shape, such as a sphere or a cylinder.
Ray
Represents a ray in 3D space, defined by a starting point (head) and a direction vector.
RayTracerBase
 
RayTracerType
Ray tracer types
RenderTests
Test rendering a basic image
Scene
 
SimpleRayTracer
SimpleRayTracer is a basic implementation of the RayTracerBase class.
Sphere
Represents a sphere in 3D space, defined by a center point and a radius.
Triangle
Represents a triangle in 3D space, defined as a specific case of a polygon with three vertices.
Tube
Represents an infinite tube in 3D space, defined by a central axis (a ray) and a radius.
Util
Util class is used for some internal utilities, e.g.
Vector
Represents a three-dimensional vector in 3D space, extending the Point class.
